title: Devil Hunter Yohko (Dub)
alternative_title: Mamono Hunter Youko; Demon Hunter Youko; Mamono Hunter Yohko; 魔物ハンター妖子
description: Yohko Mono is a regular girl making her way through high school--until she learns that she is the 108th successor to a line of warriors charged with defending the earth against demons. Eventually she must fight her ultimate battle against the demon who started it all.
